Mozilla

May followup

Toronto hosted its first MapTime last Thursday to a great room of beginners to experienced mappers. Courtney Claessens gave a 10min talk on what is MapTime, followed by ad hoc conversations about map making.

Weâ€™ve kept all the sticky notes submitted on what topics we should cover next and what talks people can give! Thank you all for coming and we to see you and many more at the next!
